William Cobb
AKA=Talon
Type=Character
Affiliation=Court of Owls, Suicide Squad
Setting=DC Comics
Species=Meta-Human

He was given enhanced abilities through electrum implants. He fathered a son who would become Dick Grayson's grandfather, creating a legacy of acrobats that the Court planned to use as future Talons.
